sentence: Similar challenges have been filed against other Republican lawmakers, including Reps. Andy Biggs (R-Ariz.), Paul Gosar (R-Ariz.) and Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.), though a federal judge has blocked the challenge to Cawthorn's ability to appear on the ballot.
author: Max Greenwood
title: Greene rebuffs Jan. 6 criticism during tense hearing

sentence: State senator Chuck Edwards isn't well-known outside of North Carolina, but that won't be the case for long if his bid to knock off Representative Madison Cawthorn in an upcoming Republican primary election succeeds.
author: Dan McLaughlin
title: Madison Cawthorn's Primary Challenger Is Everything Cawthorn Isn't

sentence: North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn has been involved in so many scandals since his 2020 congressional election that we need a timeline to keep track.
author: Paige Harriss
title: Madison Cawthorn's scandalous freshman term: 11 controversial moments since joining Congress
